improved_heroic_strike.label: Improved Heroic Strike
improved_heroic_strike.description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by {a} rage point(s).

improved_rend.label: Improved Rend
improved_rend.description: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by {a}%.

improved_charge.label: Improved Charge
improved_charge.description: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by {a}.

iron_will.label: Iron Will
iron_will.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional {a}%.

improved_thunder_clap.label: Improved Thunder Clap
improved_thunder_clap.description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap by {a} rage point and increases the damage by {b}% and the slowing effect by an additional {c}%.

improved_overpower.label: Improved Overpower
improved_overpower.description: Increase the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by {a}%.

anger_management.label: Anger Management
anger_management.description: Generates {a} rage per 3 seconds while in combat.

deep_wounds.label: Deep Wounds
deep_wounds.description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing {a}% of your melee weapon's average damage over 12 seconds.

two_handed_weapon_specialization.label: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
two_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by {a}%.

impale.label: Impale
impale.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive and Berserker stance by {a}%.

improved_slam.label: Improved Slam
improved_slam.description: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by {a} sec.

poleaxe_specialization.label: Poleaxe Specialization
poleaxe_specialization.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by {a}%.

sweeping_strikes.label: Sweeping Strikes
sweeping_strikes.description: Your next {a} melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

mace_specialization.label: Mace Specialization
mace_specialization.description: Gives your melee attacks a chance to stun your target for 3 seconds and generate {a} rage when using a mace.

sword_specialization.label: Sword Specialization
sword_specialization.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hittin your target with your Sword.

improved_intercept.label: Improved Intercept
improved_intercept.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by {a} sec.

improved_hamstring.label: Improved Hamstring
improved_hamstring.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a {a}% chance to immobilize the target for 5 seconds.

improved_disciplines.label: Improved Disiplines
improved_disciplines.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Retaliation, Recklessness and Shield Wall abilities by {a} min and increases their duration by {b} sec.

blood_frenzy.label: Blood Frenzy
blood_frenzy.description: Your Rend and Deep Wounds abilities also increase all physical damage caused to that target by {a}%.

mortal_strike.label: Mortal Strike
mortal_strike.description: A viscious strike that deals weapon damage plus {a} and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

second_wind.label: Second Wind
second_wind.description: Whenever you are struck by a Stun or Immobilize effect you will generate {a} rage and {b}% of your total health over 10 seconds.

endless_rage.label: Endless Rage
endless_rage.description: You generate {a}% more rage from damage dealt.

empowered_rend.label: Empowered Rend
empowered_rend.description: The damage dealt by Rend is {a} seconds faster.

bladestorm.label: Bladestorm
bladestorm.description:
Instantly Whirlwind up to 4 nearby targets and for thr next 6 seconds you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec.

While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear, you cannot be stopped unless killed, and your movement speed cannot be reduced below 60%.

cruelty.label: Cruelty
cruelty.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by {a}%.

booming_voice.label: Booming Voice
booming_voice.description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Commanding Shout by {a}%.

improved_demoralizing_shout.label: Improved Demoralizing Shout
improved_demoralizing_shout.description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by {a}%.

unbridled_wrath.label: Unbridled Wrath
unbridled_wrath.description: 'Gives you a chance to generate an additional {a} rage point(s) when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

improved_cleave.label: Blood Craze
improved_cleave.description: Regenerates {a}% of your total Health over 6 seconds after being the victim of a critical strike.

piercing_howl.label: Piercing Howl
piercing_howl.description: Causes all enemies within 10 yards to be Dazed, reducing movement speed by {a}% for 6 seconds.

blood_craze.label: Improved Cleave
blood_craze.description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by {a}%.

commanding_presence.label: Commanding Presence
commanding_presence.description: Increases the melee Attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by {a}%.

dual_wield_specialization.label: Dual Wield Specialization
dual_wield_specialization.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by {a}%.

enrage.label: Enrage
enrage.description: 'Gives you a {a}% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

improved_execute.label: Improved Execute
improved_execute.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Execute ability by {a}.

death_wish.label: Death Wish
death_wish.description: When activated, increases your physical damage by {a}% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but increases all damage taken by 5%. Lasts 30 seconds.

weapon_mastery.label: Weapon Mastery
weapon_mastery.description:
Reduces the chance for your attacks to be dodged by {a}% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by {b}.
This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

improved_berserker_rage.label: Improved Berserker Rage
improved_berserker_rage.description: Berserker Rage ability will generate {a} rage when used.

flurry.label: Flurry
flurry.description: Increases your attack speed by {a}% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by {a}%.

bloodthirst.label: bloodthirst
bloodthirst.description:
Instantly attack the target causing {a} damage. In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health.
This effect lasts 8 seconds. Damage is based on your attack power.

improved_whirlwind.label: Improved Whirlwind
improved_whirlwind.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind ability by {a} sec.

improved_berserker_stance.label: Improved Berserker Stance
improved_berserker_stance.description: Increases attack power by {a}% and reduces threat caused by {a}% while in Berserker Stance.

single_minded_fury.label: Single-Minded Fury
single_minded_fury.description: While dual-wielding, your movement speed is increased by 10% and you gain 2% attack speed each time your melee auto-attack strikes the same target as your previous auto-attack, stacking up to 10 times. Lasts 10 sec or until your auto-attack strikes a different target.

improved_bloodrage.label: Improved Bloodrage
improved_bloodrage.description: Increases the instant rage generated by yor Bloodrage ability {a}.

tactical_mastery.label: Tactical Mastery
tactical_mastery.description:
You retain up to an additional {a} of your rage points when you change stances.
Also greatly increases the threat generated by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities when you are in Defensive Stance.

shield_specialization.label: Shield Specialization
shield_specialization.description: Increases your chance to block attacks by {a}% and has a {b}% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

toughness.label: Toughness
toughness.description: Increases your armor value from items by {a}%.

last_stand.label: Last Stand
last_stand.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants {a}% of your maximum health for 20 seconds. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

improved_shield_block.label: Improved Shield Block
improved_shield_block.description: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack and increases the duration by {a} second.

improved_revenge.label: Improved Revenge
improved_revenge.description: Gives your Revenge ability a {a}% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

defiance.label: Defiance
defiance.description: Increases the threat generated by your attack by {a}% while in Defensive Stance and rduces your chance to be dodged or parried by {b}%.

improved_sunder_armor.label: Improved Sunder Armor
improved_sunder_armor.description: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor and Devestate abilities by {a} rage point.

improved_disarm.label: Imporved Disarm
improved_disarm.description: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by {a} sec(s).

improved_taunt.label: Improved Taunt
improved_taunt.description: Reduced the cooldown of your Taunt ability by {a} sec alongside increasing the range by 7 yards.

improved_shieldwall.label: Improved Shield Wall
improved_shieldwall.description: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by {a} secs.

improved_shield_bash.label: Improved Shield Bash
improved_shield_bash.description: Gives your Shield Bash ability a {a}% chance to silence the target for 3 seconds.

shield_mastery.label: Shield Mastery
shield_mastery.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by {a}%.

one_handed_weapon_specialization.label: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
one_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases physical damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by {a}%.

improved_defensive_stance.label: Improved Defensive Stance
improved_defensive_stance.description: Reduces all spell damage taken while in Defensive Stance by {a}%.

shield_slam.label: Shield Slam
shield_slam.description:
Slam the target with your shield, causing {a} damage, modified by your shield block value and dispels 1 magic effect on the target.
Also causes a high amount of threat.

focused_rage.label: Focused Rage
focused_rage.description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by {a}.

vitality.label: Vitality
vitality.description: Increases your total Stamina by {a}% and your total Strength by {b}%.

devestate.label: Devestate
devestate.description:
Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect.
In addition, causes {a}% of weapon damage plus 15 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target.
The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.

improved_eviscerate.label: Improved Eviscerate
improved_eviscerate.description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by {a}%.

remorseless_attacks.label: Remorseless Attacks
remorseless_attacks.description: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a {a}% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike. Lasts 20 sec.

malice.label: Malice
malice.description: Increases your critical strike chance by {a}%.

ruthlessness.label: Ruthlessness
ruthlessness.description: Gives your melee finishing moves a {a}% chance to add a combo point to your target.

murder.label: Murder
murder.description: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid, Giant, Beast and Dragonkin targets by {a}%.

puncturing_wounds.label: Puncturing Wounds
puncturing_wounds.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by {a}% and the critical stroke chance of your Mutilate ability by {b}%.

relentless_strikes.label: Relentless Strikes
relentless_strikes.description: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

improved_expose_armor.label: Improved Expose Armor
improved_expose_armor.description: Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by {a}%.

lethality.label: Lethality
lethality.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, Shiv and Hemorrhage by {a}%.

vile_poisons.label: Vile Poisons
vile_poisons.description: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons and Envenom ability by {a}% and gives your poisons an additional {b}% chance to resist dispel effects.

improved_poisons.label: Improved Poisons
improved_poisons.description: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by {a}% and increases the duration of your poison on your weapon by {b}%.

fleet_footed.label: Fleet Footed
fleet_footed.description:
Increases your chance to resist movement impairing effects by {a}% and increases your movement speed by {b}%.

This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

cold_blooded.label: Cold Blood
cold_blooded.description: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%.

improved_kidney_shot.label: Improved Kidney Shot
improved_kidney_shot.description: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target recieves an additional {a}% damage from all sources.

quick_recovery.label: Quick Recovery
quick_recovery.description: All healing effects on you are increased by {a}%. In addition, your finishing moves cost {b}% less Energy when they fail to hit

poisoned_knife.label: Poisoned Knife
poisoned_knife.description: Throw and Deadly Throw now have a {a}% chance to consume 10 minutes of your off-hand weapon's poison to apply it to the target.

seal_fate.label: Seal Fate
seal_fate.description: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a {a}% chance to add an additional combo point.

master_poisoner.label: Master Poisoner
master_poisoner.description: Reduces the chance your poisons will be resisted by {a}% and increases your chance to resist Poison effects by an additional {b}% and gives Envenom a {c}% chance to not consume Deadly Poison.

vigor.label: Vigor
vigor.description: Increases your maximum energy by 20 and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

find_weakness.label: Find Weakness
find_weakness.description: Your finishing moves increase the damage of all your offensive abilities by {a}% for 10 seconds.

mutilate.label: Mutilate
mutilate.description:
Instantly attacks with both weapons for an additional 44 with each weapon. Damage ist increased by 50% against Poisoned targets.
Awards 2 combo points.

improved_gouge.label: Improved Gouge
improved_gouge.description: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by {a} sec.

improved_sinister_strike.label: Improved Sinister Strike
improved_sinister_strike.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike ability by {a}.

improvend_slice_and_dice.label: Improved Slice and Dice
improvend_slice_and_dice.description: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by {a}%.

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Increases your chance to hit with weapons by {a}%.

endurance.label: Endurance
endurance.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by {a} sec.

riposte.label: Riposte
riposte.description: A strike that becomes active after parrying an oppnents attack. This attack deals 150% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 seconds.

improved_sprint.label: Improved Sprint
improved_sprint.description: Gives a {a}% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability.

improved_kick.label: Imroved Kick
improved_kick.description: Gives your Kick ability a {a}% chance to silence the target for 2 seconds.

dagger_specialization.label: Dagger Specialization
dagger_specialization.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers by {a}%.

dual_wield_specialization.label: Dual Wield Specialization
dual_wield_specialization.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by {a}%.

axe_specialization.label: Axe Specialization
axe_specialization.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to cause your target to bleed for 100% weapon damage over 15 seconds after hitting them with an Axe.

mace_specialization.label: Mace Specialization
mace_specialization.description: Increases the damage dealt by your critical Strikes with Maces by {a}%, and gives you a {b}% chance to stun your target for 3 seconds with a mace.

blade_flurry.label: Blade Flurry
blade_flurry.description: Increases your attack speed by 20%. In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 15 seconds.

sword_specialization.label: Sword Specialization
sword_specialization.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your sword.

fist_weapon_specialization.label: Fist Weapon Spezialization
fist_weapon_specialization.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Fist Weapons by {a}%.

blade_twisting.label: Blade Twisting
blade_twisting.description: Gives your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Gouge and Shiv abilities a {a}% chance to Daze the target for 4 seconds.

weapon_expertise.label: Weapon Expertise
weapon_expertise.description: Reduces your chance to be dodged or parried by {a}%.

aggression.label: Aggression
aggression.description: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Backstab and Eviscerate abilities by {a}%.

vitality.label: Vitality
vitality.description: Increases your total Stamina by {a}% and your total Agility by {b}%.

adrenaline_rush.label: Adrenaline Rush
adrenaline_rush.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 seconds.

nerves_of_steel.label: Nerves of Steel
nerves_of_steel.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear effects by an additional {a}%.

combat_potency.label: Combat Potency
combat_potency.description: Gives your successful off-hand melee attacks a 20% chance to generate {a} Energy.

surprise_attacks.label: Surprise Attacks
surprise_attacks.description: Your finishing moves can no longer be dodged and the damage dealt by your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Shiv and Gouge abilities is increased by 10%.

master_of_deception.label: Master of Deception
master_of_deception.description: Reduces the chance enemies have to deflect you while in Stealth. More effective with more ranks.

opportunity.label: Opportunity
opportunity.description: Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Mutilate, Garotte and Ambush abilities by {a}%.

sleight_of_hand.label: Sleight of Hand
sleight_of_hand.description: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by {a}% and increases the threat reduction of your Feint ability by {b}%.

dirty_tricks.label: Dirty Tricks
dirty_tricks.description: Increases the range of your Blind and Sap abilities by {a} yards and reduces the energy cost of your Blind and Sap abilities by {b}%.

camouflage.label: Camouflage
camouflage.description: Increases your speed while stealthed by {a}% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by {b} sec.

initiative.label: Inititive
initiative.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote or Cheap Shot ability.

ghostly_strike.label: Ghostly Strike
ghostly_strike.description:
A strike that deals 125% weapon damage and increases your dodge by 15% for 7 seconds.
Awards 1 Combo Point.

improved_ambush.label: Improved Ambush
improved_ambush.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by {a}%.

setup.label: Setup
setup.description: Gives a {a}% chance to add a combo point to your target after dodging their attack or fully resisting one of their spells.

elusiveness.label: Elusiveness
elusiveness.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by {a} seconds.

serrated_blades.label: Serrated Blades
serrated_blades.description: Causes your attacks to ignore {a} ofd your targets Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by {b}%. The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.

heightened_senses.label: Heightened Senses
heightened_senses.description: Increases your Stealth detection and reduces the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by {a}%.

preparation.label: Preparation
preparation.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Evasion, Sprint, Vanish, Cold Blood, Shadowstep and Premeditation abilities.

dirty_deeds.label: Dirty Deeds
dirty_deeds.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garotte abilities by {a}. Additionally, your special abilities cause {a}% more damage against targets below 35% helath.

hemorrhage.label: Hemorrhage
hemorrhage.description:
An instant strike that deals 110% weapon damage and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing any Physical damage dealt to the target by up to 13. Lasts 10 charges or 15 seconds.
Awards 1 Combo Point.

master_of_subtlety.label: Master of Subtlety
master_of_subtlety.description: Attacks made while stealthed and for 6 seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional {a}% damage.

enveloping_shadows.label: Enveloping Shadows
enveloping_shadows.description: Increases your chance to avoid area of effect attacks by an additional {a}%.

premeditation.label: Premeditation
premeditation.description: When used, adds 2 Combo Points to your target. You must add to or use these Combo Points within 10 seconds or the combo points are lost.

cheat_death.label: Cheat Death
cheat_death.description: You hav a {a}% chance that an attack which would otherwise kill you will instead reduce you to 10% of your maximum health, unless the attack is too devastating. In addition, all damage taken will be reduced by an amount equal to twice your dodge chance up to 90% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once per minute.

sinister_calling.label: Sinister Calling
sinister_calling.description: Increases your total Agility by {a}% and increases the percentage damage bonus of Backstab and Hemorrhage by an additional {b}%.

shadowstep.label: Shadowstep
shadowstep.description: Attempts to step through the shadows and reappear behind your enemy and increases movement speed by 70% for 3 seconds. The damage of your next ability is increased by 20% and the threat caused is reduced by 50%. Lasts 10 seconds.

convection.label: Convection
convection.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Molten Blast, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by {a}%.

concussion.label: Concussion
concussion.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Molten Blast, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by {a}%.

earths_grasp.label: Earth's Grasp
earths_grasp.description: Your Earth Totems give you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Shaman damaging spell. Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by {a}% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by {b}%.

elemental_warding.label: Elemental Warding
elemental_warding.description: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by {a}%.

call_of_flame.label: Call of Flame
call_of_flame.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by {a}% and increases the critical strike chance of your Molten Blast spell by an additional {b}%.

elemental_focus.label: Elemental Focus
elemental_focus.description: After landing a critical strike with a Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell, you enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next 2 damage spells or fire totems by 40%.

reverbaration.label: Reverberation
reverbaration.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by {a} sec.

fire_and_lightning_mastery.label: Fire and Lightning Mastery
fire_and_lightning_mastery.description: Reduces the cast time of your Molten Blast, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by {a} sec.

improved_fire_totems.label: Improved Fire Totems
improved_fire_totems.description: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by {a} sec. and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by {b}%.

rolling_thunder.label: Rolling Thunder
rolling_thunder.description:
If you have an active Lightning Shield, your critical hits with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a {a}% chance to cause your Lightning Shield to gain an additional charges, up to 9. When you reach 9 charges, any attempt to gain another charge will instead launch a Lightning Shield ball at your target.

When you have more than 3 Lightning Shield charges active, your Earth Shock spell will consume up to {b} surplus charge after 2 seconds for up to {c} seconds, sending it at your target.

elemental_devastation.label: Elemental Devastation
elemental_devastation.description: Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by {a}% for 10 seconds.

storm_reach.label: Storm Reach
storm_reach.description: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by {a} yards.

elemental_fury.label: Elemental Fury
elemental_fury.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

unrelenting_storm.label: Unrelenting Storm
unrelenting_storm.description: Regenerate mana equal to {a}% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

elemental_precision.label: Elemental Precision
elemental_precision.description: Increases your chance to hit with spells by {a}% and reduces the threat caused by Fire, Frost and Nature spells by {b}%.

call_of_thunder.label: Call of Thunder
call_of_thunder.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional {a}%.

elemental_mastery.label: Elemental Mastery
elemental_mastery.description: When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance and reduces the mana cost by 100%.

elemental_shields.label: Elemental Shields
elemental_shields.description: Reduces the chance you will be critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by {a}%.

elemental_overload.label: Elemental Overload
elemental_overload.description: Gives your Molten Blast, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells a {a}% chance to cast a second, similar spell on the same target at no additional cost that causes half damage and no threat.

totem_of_wrath.label: Totem of Wrath
totem_of_wrath.description: Summons a Totem of Wrath with 5 health at the feet of the caster.  The totem increases the chance to hit and critically strike with spells by 3% for all party and raid members within 20 yards.  Lasts 120 seconds.

shield_specialization.label: Shield Specialization
shield_specialization.description: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by {a}% and increases the amount blocked by {b}%.

guardian_totems.label: Guardian Totems
guardian_totems.description: Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by {a}% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by {b} sec.

thundering_strikes.label: Thundering Strikes
thundering_strikes.description: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by {a}%.

improved_ghost_wolf.label: Improved Ghost Wolf
improved_ghost_wolf.description: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by {a} sec.

improved_lightning_shield.label: Improved Lightning Shield
improved_lightning_shield.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by {a}%.

enhancing_totems.label: Enhancing Totems
enhancing_totems.description: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by {a}%.

shamanistic_focus.label: Shamanistic Focus
shamanistic_focus.description: After landing a melee critical strike, you enter a Focused state.  The Focused state reduces the mana cost of your next Shock spell by 60%.

anticipation.label: Anticipation
anticipation.description: Increases your chance to dodge by an additional {a}%.

flurry.label: Flurry
flurry.description: Increases your attack speed by {a}% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

toughness.label: Toughness
toughness.description: Increases your armor value from items by {a}%, and reduces the duration of movement slowing effects on you by {a}%.

improved_weapon_totems.label: Improved Weapon Totems
improved_weapon_totems.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by {a}% and increases the damage caused and spell damage granted by your Flametongue Totem by {a}%.

spirit_weapons.label: Spirit Weapons
spirit_weapons.description: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks and reduces the threat generated by your melee attacks unless you are wearing a shield by 30%.

elemental_weapons.label: Elemental Weapons
elemental_weapons.description: Increases the damage caused by your Rockbiter Weapon by {a}%, your Windfury Weapon effect by {b}% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by {c}%.

mental_quickness.label: Mental Quickness
mental_quickness.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast Shaman spells by {a}% and increases your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to {b}% of your attack power.

weapon_mastery.label: Weapon Mastery
weapon_mastery.description: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by {a}%.

weapon_specialization.label: Weapon Specialization
weapon_specialization.description: Increases your chance to hit with all weapons by an additional {a}%.

primal_wielding.label: Primal Wielding
primal_wielding.description:
Allows one-hand and off-hand weapons to be equipped in the off-hand.

Additionally, your Lightning Bolt and Molten Blast spells no longer delay your next melee swing, but deal 50% less damage if cast within 4.5 seconds after a melee attack.

stormstrike.label: Stormstrike
stormstrike.description: Instantly attack with your weapon, or both weapons if you are dual wielding.  In addition, the target takes 5% additional Nature damage.  Lasts 12 seconds.

unleashed_rage.label: Unleashed Rage
unleashed_rage.description: Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase all party and raid members' melee attack power by {a} if within 20 yards of the Shaman.  Lasts 10 seconds.

shamanistic_rage.label: Shamanistic Rage
shamanistic_rage.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and causes your successful melee attacks to regenerate mana (based on weapon speed and attack power).  Lasts 15 seconds.

improved_healing_wave.label: Improved Healing Wave
improved_healing_wave.description: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by {a} sec.

tidal_focus.label: Tidal Focus
tidal_focus.description: Reduces the mana cost of your healing spells by {a}%.

improved_reincarnation.label: Improved Reincarnation
improved_reincarnation.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by {a} min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional {a}%.

ancestral_healing.label: Ancestral Healing
ancestral_healing.description: Increases your target's armor value by {a}% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

totemic_focus.label: Totemic Focus
totemic_focus.description: Reduces the mana cost of your totems by {a}%.

natures_guidance.label: Nature's Guidance
natures_guidance.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by {a}%.

healing_focus.label: Healing Focus
healing_focus.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Shaman healing spell.

totemic_mastery.label: Totemic Mastery
totemic_mastery.description: The radius of your totems that affect friendly targets is increased to 30 yards.

healing_grace.label: Healing Grace
healing_grace.description: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by {a}% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by {b}%.

restorative_totems.label: Restorative Totems
restorative_totems.description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by {a}%.

tidal_mastery.label: Tidal Mastery
tidal_mastery.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by {a}%.

healing_way.label: Healing Way
healing_way.description: Your Healing Wave spells have a {a}% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 seconds.  This effect will stack up to 3 times.

natures_swiftness.label: Nature's Swiftness
natures_swiftness.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

focused_mind.label: Focused Mind
focused_mind.description: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the Shaman by {a}%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

purification.label: Purification
purification.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by {a}%.

mana_tide_totem.label: Mana Tide Totem
mana_tide_totem.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 20 yards.

natures_guardian.label: Nature's Guardian
natures_guardian.description: Whenever a damaging attack is taken that reduces you below 30% health, you have a {a}% chance to heal 10% of your total health and reduce your threat level on that target.  5 second cooldown.

natures_blessing.label: Nature's Blessing
natures_blessing.description: Increases your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to {a}% of your Intellect.

improved_chain_heal.label: Improved Chain Heal
improved_chain_heal.description: Increases the amount healed by your Chain Heal spell by {a}%.

earth_shield.label: Earth Shield
earth_shield.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, giving a 30% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 150.  This effect can only occur once every few seconds.  6 charges.  Lasts 600 seconds.  Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.
